tool.name: OGS: VerticalSliceFromLayers
tool.description: Galaxy wrapper for the OGS utility 'VerticalSliceFromLayers'.

param.name: resolution
param.label: resolution
param.help: desired edge length of triangles in the resulting slice, (min = 0)

param.name: end_y
param.label: end y
param.help: y-coordinates of the end point defining the slice

param.name: end_x
param.label: end x
param.help: x-coordinates of the end point defining the slice

param.name: start_y
param.label: start y
param.help: y-coordinates of the start point defining the slice

param.name: start_x
param.label: start x
param.help: x-coordinates of the start point defining the slice

param.name: input
param.label: input
param.help: name of the input file list containing the paths the all input layers

tool.help: This tool runs the **VerticalSliceFromLayers** utility from the OpenGeoSys suite.
